info.abstract:
[Behaviour] Converts a value into a binary array of measures.
[Parameters] - input measure type : not used. - output measure type : Ophidia typing. Supported types are: 'oph_double'; 'oph_float'; 'oph_long'; 'oph_int'; 'oph_short'; 'oph_byte'. - value : numeric value to be converted.
[Return type] Binary-array.
[Examples] Convert the value '112.45' into a binary value. oph_value_to_bin('','OPH_DOUBLE',112.45)
